mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TOURIST_SPOT_INTRO ( COT_ID, ACCOM_COUNT, CHK_BABY_CARRIAGE, CHK_CREDITCARD, CHK_PET, EXP_AGE_RANGE, EXP_GUIDE, HERITAGE1, HERITAGE2, HERITAGE3, INFO_CENTER, OPEN_DATE, PARKING, REST_DATE, USE_SEASON, USE_TIME ) VALUES ( #{cotid}, #{accomcount}, #{chkbabycarriage}, #{chkcreditcard}, #{chkpet}, #{expagerange}, #{expguide}, #{heritage1}, #{heritage2}, #{heritage3}, #{infocenter}, #{opendate}, #{parking}, #{restdate}, #{useseason}, #{usetime} )

INSERT INTO CULTURAL_FACILITIES_INTRO ( COT_ID, ACCOM_COUNT, SCALE, SPENDTIME, CHK_BABY_CARRIAGE, CHK_CREDITCARD, CHK_PET, DISCOUNT_INFO, INFO_CENTER, PARKING, PARKING_FEE, REST_DATE, USE_FEE, USE_TIME ) VALUES ( #{cotId}, #{accomcount}, #{scale}, #{spendtime}, #{chkbabycarriage}, #{chkcreditcard}, #{chkpet}, #{discountinfo}, #{infocenter}, #{parking}, #{parkingfee}, #{restdate}, #{usefee}, #{usetime} )

INSERT INTO FESTIVAL_INTRO ( COT_ID, SCALE, SPEND_TIME, AGE_LIMIT, BOOKING_PLACE, DISCOUNT_INFO, EVENT_END_DATE, EVENT_HOMEPAGE, EVENT_PLACE, EVENT_START_DATE, FESTIVAL_GRADE, PLACE_INFO, PLAY_TIME, PROGRAM, SPONSOR1, SPONSOR1_TEL, SPONSOR2, SPONSOR2_TEL, SUB_EVENT, USE_FEE ) VALUES ( #{cotid}, #{scale}, #{spendtime}, #{agelimit}, #{bookingplace}, #{discountinfo}, #{eventenddate}, #{eventhomepage}, #{eventplace}, #{eventstartdate}, #{festivalgrade}, #{placeinfo}, #{playtime}, #{program}, #{sponsor1}, #{sponsor1tel}, #{sponsor2}, #{sponsor2tel}, #{subevent}, #{usefee} )
INSERT INTO COURSE_INTRO ( COT_ID, DISTANCE, TAKE_TIME, CONTACT_INFO, SCHEDULE, THEME ) VALUES ( #{cotId}, #{distance}, #{taketime}, #{contactinfo}, #{schedule}, #{theme} )

INSERT INTO LEPORTS_INTRO ( COT_ID, ACCOM_COUNT, CHK_BABY_CARRIAGE, CHK_CREDITCARD, CHK_PET, EXP_AGE_RANGE, INFO_CENTER, OPEN_PERIOD, PARKING_FEE, PARKING, RESERVATION, REST_DATE, SCALE, USE_FEE, USE_TIME ) VALUES ( #{cotId}, #{accomcount}, #{chkbabycarriage}, #{chkcreditcard}, #{chkpet}, #{expagerange}, #{infocenter}, #{openperiod}, #{parkingfee}, #{parking}, #{reservation}, #{restdate}, #{scale}, #{usefee}, #{usetime} )

INSERT INTO ACCOMMODATION_INTRO ( COT_ID, ACCOM_COUNT, BENIKIA, CHECK_IN_TIME, CHECK_OUT_TIME, CHK_COOKING, FOOD_PLACE, GOOD_STAY, HANOK, CONTACT_INFO, PARKING, PICKUP, ROOM_COUNT, RESERVATION, RESERVATION_URL, ROOM_TYPE, SCALE, SUB_FACILITY, BARBECUE, BEAUTY, BICYCLE, COMPFIRE, FITNESS, KARAOKE, PUBLIC_BATH, PUBLIC_PC, SAUNA, SEMINAR, SPORTS ) VALUES ( #{cotId}, #{accomcount}, #{benikia}, #{checkintime}, #{checkouttime}, #{chkcooking}, #{foodplace}, #{goodstay}, #{hanok}, #{contactinfo}, #{parking}, #{pickup}, #{roomcount}, #{reservation}, #{reservationurl}, #{roomtype}, #{scale}, #{subfacility}, #{barbecue}, #{beauty}, #{bicycle}, #{compfire}, #{fitness}, #{karaoke}, #{publicbath}, #{publicpc}, #{sauna}, #{seminar}, #{sports} )

INSERT INTO SHOPPING_INTRO ( COT_ID, CHK_BABY_CARRIAGE, CHK_CREDITCARD, CHK_PET, CULTURE_CENTER, FAIR_DAY, CONTACT_INFO, OPEN_DATE, OPEN_TIME, PARKING, REST_DATE, REST_ROOM, SALE_ITEM, SALE_ITEM_COST, SCALE, SHOP_GUIDE ) VALUES ( #{cotId}, #{chkbabycarriage}, #{chkcreditcard}, #{chkpet}, #{culturecenter}, #{fairday}, #{contactinfo}, #{opendate}, #{opentime}, #{parking}, #{restdate}, #{restroom}, #{saleitem}, #{saleitemcost}, #{scale}, #{shopguide} )

INSERT INTO EATERY_INTRO ( COT_ID, CHK_CREDITCARD, DISCOUNT_INFO, FIRST_MENU, CONTACT_INFO, KIDS_FACILITY, OPEN_DATE, OPEN_TIME, PACKING, PARKING, RESERVATION, REST_DATE, SCALE, SEAT, SMOKING, TREAT_MENU ) VALUES ( #{cotId}, #{chkcreditcard}, #{discountinfo}, #{firstmenu}, #{contactinfo}, #{kidsfacility}, #{opendate}, #{opentime}, #{packing}, #{parking}, #{reservation}, #{restdate}, #{scale}, #{seat}, #{smoking}, #{treatmenu} )
